title: Sir Francis Bacon his apologie, in certaine imputations concerning the late Earle of Essex VVritten to the right Honorable his very good Lord, the Earle of Deuonshire, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Felix Norton and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Parrot,
